content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KM is available at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://km.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://km.epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Application is accessible from EPAM network only; VPN connection to EPAM network should be established to access the system from Internet. It contains shortcuts to all the information and systems employees usually need access to: Employee Handbook, Media Library, Adaptation Portal, PMC, ESP, EPIS, etc. Information is grouped into logical blocks, which are available on separate tabs:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/717cf54f-5eac-4cba-838a-b2d04f465f1b/image2014-10-7%2011:41:4.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":624,\"height\":429}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
